mapper.insert: insert into cartT (ctno, mid, gno, cno, amount, rpeople) values (ctidx.nextval, #{mid}, #{gno}, #{cno}, #{amount}, #{rpeople})
mapper.select: select ctno, m.mid as mid, mname, mphone, ct.gno as gno, ct.cno as cno, golfcourseNm, courseNm, c.courseHole as courseHole, regPrice, regPrice_wknd, amount, rpeople, ct.regdate as regdate from cartT ct join ProductT p on ct.gno = p.gno join courseT c on ct.cno = c.cno join golfT g on ct.gno = g.gno join memberT m on ct.mid = m.mid where ct.mid=#{mid}
